options(scipen=999)
pn = function(c,d){
    cc = c[c!=0]
    dd = d[c!=0]
    p = paste0("{",cc,"}x^{",dd,"}",collapse="+")
    p = gsub("x^{0}","",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("x^{1}","x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("+{-","-{",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("+{1}x","+x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("-{1}x","-x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("{-1}x","-x",p,fixed=T)
    p = gsub("{1}x","x",p,fixed=T)
    return(p)
}

pows = sample(2:9,4)
